cluster_relations.rel_desc: Research on nonverbal communication examines the role and magnitude of nonverbal cues in communication.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: The subject research activity examines, studies, or explores the properties, role, or behavior of the object.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: ResearchOutcome: nonverbal cues are a significant portion of communication

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The broader body of research on nonverbal communication includes the specific studies that estimate body language's share of communication.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: The subject research activity or program generates the object research outputs, such as specific studies, papers, or findings.
remarks: Slight ambiguity whether 'research' refers broadly to the same set of studies.
